entry.title: Can FTX Customers Expect Any Money Back?
entry.summary: Today we’re bringing you the most recent developments in FTX’s astonishing demise, which the Financial times has called ‘’one of the biggest financial frauds in US history’’. Many customers are still wondering how much, if any, of their money will be returned. Let’s quickly get up to date, find out what transpired in yesterday’s hearing, […]
